plants.name: Prunus serrulata
plants.description: Japanese Cherry Blossom is a deciduous tree famous for its beautiful and abundant pink to white flowers that bloom in early spring, marking the arrival of warmer weather.
plants.funFact: In Japan, the blooming of cherry blossoms is celebrated with hanami, a traditional flower-viewing festival.

plants.name: Narcissus pseudonarcissus
plants.description: The wild daffodil is a perennial herbaceous plant with bright yellow trumpet-shaped flowers that typically bloom in early spring in woodland and meadow habitats.
plants.funFact: Wild daffodils are often among the first spring flowers to bloom, symbolizing rebirth and renewal.

plants.name: Ceanothus
plants.description: Ceanothus is a genus of shrubs native to North America, known for clusters of small, fragrant blue to purple flowers that bloom in spring, attracting pollinators like bees and butterflies.
plants.funFact: Some species of Ceanothus are nitrogen-fixing, improving soil fertility.

plants.name: Erica carnea
plants.description: Winter Heath is a low-growing evergreen shrub producing small, bell-shaped flowers in shades of pink, purple, or white, blooming from late winter through early spring.
plants.funFact: Winter Heath blooms early in the year, often flowering under snow cover or just as it melts.
